```{r}
rev.forcast <- function(now, years, assump.fixed, rates, market){
  
  patients = ceiling(market$incidence*(1+market$growth)^(0:years))
  price = assump.fixed$revenue.per.patient*(1+assump.fixed$price.inflation)^(0:years)
  
  
  rev <- data.frame(year = seq(now, (now+years)),
                    total.patients = patients,
                    treat.price = price,
                    rev.total = patients*price
                    )
  
  return(rev)
  
}


forecast <- rev.forcast(2019, 10, assump.fixed, rates, market)

ggplot(forecast) +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = total.patients))


```
